content.data: Annotations
1AUALL.png
Standard Views
image5620.gif
Elevation View
image5621.gif
Show Wall Labels -  Check this option if you want to see the Wall Labels (Wall numbers).
image912.bmp
Show Object Names -  This option allows you to set the view to either show the Names of the Objects or hide them.
image913.bmp
Show Object Numbers -  This option allows you to set the view to either show the Object numbers or hide them.
image914.bmp
Stagger Object Names / Numbers -  If you check this box, the Object Names and numbers will be staggered in the view when there are adjacent Objects.
image915.bmp
Show End Types -   This option will display a label for Finished Ends.
Show Unfinished Ends -  This sub-option will display a label for Unfinished Ends.
Show Object Drawers -  This option will display lines, in Plan View, representing the number of Drawers in a an Object. Below is a Drawer Stack with four Drawers with this option activated.
image138.gif

Offset -  Sets the distance from the front of the Cabinet to the start of the drawer annotation. 
 
 
 Increment -  Sets the space between each line representing the drawers.
Offset -  Sets the distance from the front of the Cabinet to the start of the drawer annotation.
Offset -  Sets the distance from the front of the Cabinet to the start of the drawer annotation.
Increment -  Sets the space between each line representing the drawers.
Increment -  Sets the space between each line representing the drawers.
- Allows you to change the font used for Annotations in the current view.
image1502.gif
Select the Label Style -  If you decide to show Object Names and numbers, choose in this area the type of Label that you want to see for each Object.
image1503.gif
